鼧鼧鼧

鼧字的基本解释

鼧
tuó
〔鼧鼥（
b?）〕哺乳动物，体粗壮，头大耳小，四肢粗短，毛为土黄色杂以褐色，成群穴居，生活于田野和草原，以植物为食，皮毛很珍贵。亦称“旱獭”；俗称“土拨鼠”。

鼧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tuó］
［《廣韻》徒河切，平歌，定。］
［《廣韻》託何切，平歌，透。］
见“鼧鼥”。

鼧字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【鼠字部】　鼧； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1528第06
【廣韻】徒何切【集韻】唐何切，?音駝。【玉篇】鼠也。　又【廣韻】託何切【集韻】湯何切，?音佗。義同。

鼧字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
鼧字的起名意思

暂无。

鼧
Basic explanation of words
鼧
tuó
〔鼧鼥(
b?)) Mammals, strong body, big heads, small ears, stubby limbs, brown hair mixed with brown, living in groups of burrows, living in fields and grasslands, feeding on plants, fur is very precious. Also known as "marmot"; commonly known as "groundhog".
鼧
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tuó］
["Guangyun" Tu Heqi, Ping Ge, Ding. ]
["Guangyun" support where to cut, flat song, through. ]
See "鼧鼥".
鼧
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Jixia] [Mouse Character Department] 　鼧; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1528 Page 06
[Guang Yun] Tu He Qi [Ji Yun] Tang He Qi,? Sound camel. [Jade articles] Rats too.　[Guang Yun] To He cut [Ji Yun] Soup He cut,? Yin Tuo. The same meaning.
